name: Athenaeus-dev
tagline: Machine-corrected versions of the works of Athenaeus of Naucratis, Greek rhetorician and grammarian.
body:
#Welcome to athenaeus-dev!

##About
This repository hosts digital versions of public-domain editions of the works of Athenaeus of Naucratis, a Greek rhetorician and grammarian.

The XML files were produced by data entry company [Digital Divide Data](http://www.digitaldividedata.org/) (DDD), who OCR'd, corrected and encoded each print volume in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

##Contents
* _Athenaei Naucratitae Deipnosophistarum_, Vol. 1: Libri I-V (1887) Ed. Georg Kaibel. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* _Athenaei Naucratitae Deipnosophistarum_, [Vol. 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/athenaeus-dev/blob/master/athenaeus_2.xml): Libri VI-X (1887) Ed. Georg Kaibel. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* _Athenaei Naucratitae Deipnosophistarum_, [Vol. 3](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/athenaeus-dev/blob/master/athenaeus_3.xml): Libri XI-XV, Indices (1962) Ed. Georg Kaibel. Stutgardiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.

* _Athenaei Naucratitae Deipnosophistarum_, Vols. 1-3. Ed. Georg Kaibel. Lipsiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri. [plain text file].
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
